TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditCommandColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 控件的一种特殊列类型，包含用于编辑每行中的数据项的 按钮。

span.span: A special column type for the control that contains the buttons for editing data items in each row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类创建的特殊列包含控件`Edit`， `Update`，和`Cancel`用于在网格中每个数据行的按钮。Use the class to create a special column for the control that contains the `Edit`, `Update`, and `Cancel` buttons for each data row in the grid. 这些按钮允许你编辑中某一行的值控件。These buttons allow you to edit the values of a row in the control. 如果不选择任何行，则`Edit`按钮将显示中对象中的每个数据行控件。If no row is selected, an `Edit` button displays in the object for each data row in the control. 当`Edit`按钮的单击某项，引发事件和`Edit`按钮替换为`Update`和`Cancel`按钮。When the `Edit` button for an item is clicked, the event is raised and the `Edit` button is replaced with the `Update` and `Cancel` buttons. 你需要提供代码来处理事件。You need to provide code to handle the event. 一个典型的事件处理程序设置属性设置为所选的行，然后将重新绑定数据到控件。A typical event handler sets the property to the selected row, and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!NOTE] > 必须提供值， ，和属性。You must provide values for the , , and properties. 否则，关联的按钮不会出现在。Otherwise, the associated buttons will not appear in the . 中的按钮可以设置显示为超链接或下压按钮通过设置属性。The buttons in the can be set to display as hyperlinks or push buttons by setting the property. 单击`Update`或`Cancel`按钮引发或事件，分别。Clicking the `Update` or `Cancel` button raises the or event, respectively. 你需要提供代码来处理这些事件。You need to provide code to handle these events. 典型处理程序事件更新的数据，集属性`-1`（以取消选择项），然后将重新绑定数据到控件。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. 典型处理程序事件集属性`-1`（以取消选择项），然后将重新绑定数据到控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 对象可以用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。The object can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 你可用于验证控件验证用户输入显示中的输入的文本前控件。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 默认情况下，执行页验证时`Update`按钮控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in the control is clicked. 页验证确定与验证关联的输入的控件是否控件在页上通过了所有验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 若要防止发生页验证，将设置属性`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加对象传递给控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add an object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

span.span: Gets or sets the button type for the column.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定列中的按钮是否显示为普通按钮或超链接。Use the property to specify whether the buttons in the column display as push buttons or hyperlinks. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性显示`Edit`命令为下压按钮的按钮。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the `Edit` command buttons as push buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的按钮类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified button type is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置为 中的 命令按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the command button in the .

value.span: 为 中的 命令按钮显示的标题。

span.span: The caption to display for the command button in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示的文本`Cancel`中的命令按钮。Use the property to specify the text to display for the `Cancel` command button in the . > [!NOTE] > 必须提供一个值属性。You must provide a value for the property. 否则为`Cancel`命令按钮不会出现在。Otherwise, the `Cancel` command button will not appear in the . 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性，以提供自定义文本`Cancel`命令按钮。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the `Cancel` command button. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 对象中的 按钮时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when an button in the object is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 中的 按钮时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when an button in the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，执行页验证时`Update`按钮控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in a control is clicked. 页验证确定与验证关联的输入的控件是否控件在页上通过了所有验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时`Update`按钮通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an `Update` button in an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 时的值属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称`Update`按钮对象将导致验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which an `Update` button in the object causes validation. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示的文本`Update`中的命令按钮。Use the property to specify the text to display for the `Update` command button in the . > [!NOTE] > 必须提供一个值属性。You must provide a value for the property. 否则为`Update`命令按钮不会出现在。Otherwise, the `Update` command button will not appear in the . 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性，以提供自定义文本`Update`命令按钮。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the `Update` command button. summary.span: 获取或设置 对象在回发到服务器时导致验证的验证控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of validation controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 中的“Update”按钮在回发到服务器时导致验证的验证控件组。

span.span: The group of validation controls for which the Update button in an causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定为其的更新按钮中的验证组名称对象回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the Update button in an object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只是指定组的一部分的控件进行验证的验证中的更新按钮对象回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 如果未指定的值属性和属性设置为`true`，验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件中的更新按钮对象回发到服务器。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.
